name: Text Parser
tagline: Text Parser library enable us to handle YAML like simple text parameter for simulators.
body:
### Welcome to Text Parser Pages.
*Text Parser library enables us to handle YAML like simple structure of text parameter instead of a conventional full-featured XML parsing library.*

### Software Requirement
* MPI library (if parallel)

### License
*BSD (2-clause) license*

### Contributors and Contact
* Kenji    Ono        keno@{riken, iis.u-tokyo.ac}.jp
* Tomohiro Kawanabe
* Takashi  Suzuki
* Satoshi  Fuchikami
* Naoyuki  Sogo
* Eri      Takebe
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
